context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: explore various options such as patient assistance programs, discounts on medication, or even crowdfunding
explore a variety of options

explore various options such as seeking financial assistance from charitable organizations, negotiating with the drug manufacturer for a lower price, or looking for cheaper generic versions of the medication

explore all possible options such as speaking with the doctors and pharmacist about possible alternatives or cheaper generic medications, checking with different pharmacies for lower prices, discussing payment plans with the pharmacy, or even reaching out to the drug manufacturer directly as some they sometimes provide assistance programs for situations like these
explore different options
reach out to various charitable organizations or foundations that provide financial assistance for medical treatments
explore different options such as seeking financial assistance from charitable organizations, non-profits, or government programs that help with medical expenses
seek out financial assistance for medical bills
seek guidance from her healthcare provider or pharmacist

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a tow truck or roadside assistance for his broken car and then arrange a taxi, Uber, or Lyft to take him to the airport
call a taxi, ride-share service like Uber or Lyft, or a friend to come pick him up and take him to the airport
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-sharing service to get him to the airport while simultaneously contacting a roadside assistance service or tow truck for his car
call for a taxi, rideshare service such as Uber or Lyft, or roadside assistance, while also contacting the airline to inform them of his situation
call for a taxi, ride-hailing service, or roadside assistance to either fix his car or take him to the airport
call a taxi or a ride-share service like Uber or Lyft so he can get to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service immediately
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to help him get to the airport as soon as possible
call for a taxi or rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, ride-sharing service, or a friend to get a quick ride to the airport while he arranges for his car to be towed or repaired

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: try and remember if he has made any mistakes during transactions and if any customers were given excess change
check the receipts and surveillance cameras, and review all transactions that happened during his shift to see if there has been a mistake or theft
immediately report the missing money to his superior or the owner of the bakery
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or the person in charge, explaining the situation and showing his willingness to cooperate in solving the issue
check the sales receipts and compare them with the register printout to see if there might have been a mistake in giving change or recording sales
immediately inform the store owner or the appropriate personnel about the lost money, to show that he is honest and not hiding anything
immediately inform his supervisor or owner about the missing money, explaining exactly what he noticed and at what time
check the sales receipts, security cameras, or any employee reports from the day to investigate the discrepancy
check the register drawer and the sales receipts to see if a mistake was made in giving change or registering a sale
check the surveillance footage if any is available to see if the money was stolen or if it was a mistake in counting
